tool_description: Enriches location-based audience segments with demographic and socioeconomic data from census and commercial sources.

location_clusters.description: Array of location cluster identifiers to enrich

demographic_fields.description: Demographic fields to retrieve: age, income, education, household_size, etc.

data_sources.description: Data sources to use: census, commercial, social, all

geographic_level.description: Geographic aggregation level: zipcode, tract, block_group, county

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for demographic matching (0.1-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid location clusters: Provide valid cluster identifiers in the required format.
Unsupported demographic fields: Use valid demographic field names from available schema.
Invalid data sources: Use one or more of [census, commercial, social, all].
Unsupported geographic level: Use one of [zipcode, tract, block_group, county].
Confidence threshold out of range: Set confidence_threshold between 0.1 and 1.0.
usage: Provide location_clusters and demographic_fields arrays; optionally specify data_sources, geographic_level, and confidence_threshold. Returns enriched demographic profiles for each cluster.

enriched_clusters.description: Array of cluster IDs with successful demographic enrichment

demographic_profiles.description: Array of demographic profile summaries for each cluster

coverage_rate.description: Percentage of clusters successfully enriched with demographic data

data_quality_score.description: Overall quality score of demographic data matching
